channel.title: Home Page on Safi's Tech Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Home Page on Safi's Tech Journal

item.title: My current favorite FOSS(Free and Open Source Software) Game
item.description: Scorched 3D is a turn-based 3D artillery game inspired by the old MS-DOS title of Scorched Earth. The game has existed for a long time but it is an extremely addictive game.

item.title: How to run SuperTuxKart properly on your Pi4/400 with Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye (64-bit)
item.description: How to run SuperTux Kart properly without the missing graphics on Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye (64-bit) running on Raspberry Pi 4 and Raspberry Pi 400.

item.title: How to control the keyboard and mouse of your compute remotely via SSH
item.description: How to control the keyboard and mouse of your Linux machine remotely via the most easiest way with X2X via SSH without the use of a physical KVM switch or any proprietary software.

item.title: How to make Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye more useful
item.description: Raspberry Pi OS is great for beginners but it is rather limited as a desktop OS. I will explain how to turn it into a more standard Linux distro.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Safi. This is my blog and I mostly concentrate on FOSS (Free and Open Source Software), Linux and single-board computers like the Raspberry Pis though I do have other interests as well like history and archaeology.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel Free to contact me both via my email address and via my social media accounts. My email address is safiuddinkhan@gmail.com Social Media Accounts My LinkedIn Account is https://www.linkedin.com/in/safi-ud-din-khan-b752ab13a/
